inclusion.criterion: percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) or coronary artery bypass graft (CABG)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: greater or equal to 5% steatosis on MRI
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: liver stiffness greater than 7 kPa on Fibroscan
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of CAD and recently noted abdominal mass, presenting with fevers/rigors and bandemia. CT abdomen without contrast showed a large heterogeneous left upper abdominal mass consistent with pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
